solution_line_template: Mrs. Lim got {yesterday_morning_gallons} gallons - {fewer_gallons} gallons = <<{yesterday_morning_gallons}-{fewer_gallons}={this_morning_gallons}>>{this_morning_gallons} gallons this morning.

So she was able to get a total of {yesterday_morning_gallons} gallons + {yesterday_evening_gallons} gallons + {this_morning_gallons} gallons = <<{yesterday_morning_gallons}+{yesterday_evening_gallons}+{this_morning_gallons}={total_gallons}>>{total_gallons} gallons.
She was able to sell {total_gallons} gallons - {gallons_left} gallons = <<{total_gallons}-{gallons_left}={gallons_sold}>>{gallons_sold} gallons.
Thus, her total revenue for the milk is ${price_per_gallon}/gallon x {gallons_sold} gallons = $<<{price_per_gallon}*{gallons_sold}={revenue}>>{revenue}.
